ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Hunting at 25
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you tried Sol A?  I really like that zone quite a bit.  Plenty of nice items.  You could do a 3 person group pretty good in there.  Cleric, yourself and a
ygData.messageBody:
Have you tried Sol A? I really like that zone quite a bit. Plenty of nice
items. You could do a 3 person group pretty good in there. Cleric,
yourself and a ranger is nice for snare and melee damage. Also for tracking
some of those rare spawns. A few nice pieces there, Runed Lava Pendant, Imp
Skin Gloves, Obsidian Hoop (3 Int 3agil and some AC I think). Also Unrest
Tower and bar could be nice IF you can find a few good people to group with
as it can be quite a challenge if your group does not know what they are
doing. The bar has the 2ac 5 charisma earrings there, very nice I still use
1 at lvl 53. Well good luck and lets keep the msg's coming.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Dan's path [mailto:danspath@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 2:27 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Hunting at 25


Here is a question then. I've been groving from 20 to 25 in the lake of ill
omen, easy exp, I only die now when...well, I haven't died in quiet a while!
The down side is...bored. Ran a shadow knight from 1-8 just to take a break.
Tonight my lv 25 enchanter will be at Castle Mistmoore for the Halloween
bash (Our guild, the Nameless of Norath, on the nameless server, is hosting
a server wide raid). I need somewhere interesting and good for growth to
hunt. But with enough people to not spend a long time standing around
looking for a group. Should I stay in Castle Mistmoore? Or go else where? Or
what?

Vroc, Enchanter on the Nameless
_____________________
"The more I learn, o, the less I know
Friend or foe? No, there's only Us"
